trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The mutalisk regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and has not been damaged since the end of its last turn.

action.name: Glaive Wurm
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage. When the glaive wurm hits a creature, it can bounce to another creature within 10 feet of the initial target, and then again to another creature within 10 feet of the second target. A separate attack roll is made for each target. If there are multiple creatures that the glaive wurm could bounce to, the mutalisk chooses which target the glaive wurm bounces to.
